scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:sol
scripts.ats:build: npm run ats:contracts:build && npm run ats:sdk:build && npm run ats:web:build
scripts.ats:test: npm run ats:contracts:test && npm run ats:sdk:test && npm run ats:web:test
scripts.ats:contracts:test:ci: npm run test:ci --workspace=packages/ats/contracts --if-present || npm run test --workspace=packages/ats/contracts
scripts.ats:sdk:test:ci: npm run test:ci --workspace=packages/ats/sdk --if-present || npm run test --workspace=packages/ats/sdk
scripts.ats:test:ci: npm run ats:contracts:test:ci && npm run ats:sdk:test:ci && npm run ats:web:test:ci
scripts.ats:clean: npm run ats:contracts:clean && npm run ats:sdk:clean && npm run ats:web:clean
scripts.ats:publish: npm run ats:contracts:publish && npm run ats:sdk:publish
scripts.mass-payout:build: npm run build --workspace=packages/mass-payout/* && npm run build --workspace=apps/mass-payout/* --if-present
scripts.mass-payout:test: npm run test --workspace=packages/mass-payout/* && npm run test --workspace=apps/mass-payout/* --if-present
scripts.mass-payout:start: npm run mass-payout:build && npm run mass-payout:dev
scripts.ats:start: npm run ats:contracts:build && npm run ats:sdk:build && npm run ats:web:dev
scripts.clean:deps: rimraf packages/*/node_modules packages/*/*/node_modules apps/*/node_modules apps/*/*/node_modules package-lock.json node_modules
